comment.author: Tyler
comment.text: Hi everyone! I attended his last event here in march and am so bummed I couldn't get off work for this one!!!! Hello NC!!!!!

replies.author: Serenity
replies.text: I was VIP with my cousin Michael Lapaglia who is running for secretary of state in NC we had a great time at Donald Trump's rally in Kinston North Carolina and Mike Pence Rally in Wilmington NC and Mike Pence will be in Greenville nc tomorrow
